channel.title: The Nine Route
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Football Advice that Goes Deep
channel.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
channel.itunes:summary: Fantasy football advice that goes deep. Austin Lee and Alex Miglio crunch the numbers, study the tape, and track the news to help you win. Rankings, sleepers, streaming options, day-gaming targets, obscure movie references, bad puns, and more!
channel.description: Fantasy football advice that goes deep. Austin Lee and Alex Miglio crunch the numbers, study the tape, and track the news to help you win. Rankings, sleepers, streaming options, day-gaming targets, obscure movie references, bad puns, and more!

item.title: The Nine Route - Free Agency Frenzy
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin and Alex dissect the fantasy impact of all the trades, cuts, psych-outs, and free agency signings of the past week. Which players came out on top? Which players saw their fantasy value crash and burn?﻿
item.itunes:summary: Austin and Alex dissect the fantasy impact of all the trades, cuts, psych-outs, and free agency signings of the past week. Which players came out on top? Which players saw their fantasy value crash and burn?﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Free Agency Preview
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin and Alex discuss who will re-sign with their previous team, who will land a big payday, and which teams have the best and worst salary cap situations.
item.itunes:summary: Austin and Alex discuss who will re-sign with their previous team, who will land a big payday, and which teams have the best and worst salary cap situations.

item.title: The Nine Route - Combine Review
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin and Alex talk about this year's draft prospects, their combine performances, and some potential landing spots.
item.itunes:summary: ﻿Austin and Alex talk about this year's draft prospects, their combine performances, and some potential landing spots.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 16
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ﻿In this DFS-heavy episode, Austin Lee and special guest, Bryan Fontaine of Rotogrinders and PFF Fantasy, discuss the latest news, dumpster fire offenses, and daily fantasy traps.
item.itunes:summary: ﻿In this DFS-heavy episode, Austin Lee and special guest, Bryan Fontaine of Rotogrinders and PFF Fantasy, discuss the latest news, dumpster fire offenses, and daily fantasy traps.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 15
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex and Austin dig deep to give you winning advice for your championship run. News, injuries, rankings, flying unicorns, and their festive DFS picks of the week.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Alex and Austin dig deep to give you winning advice for your championship run. News, injuries, rankings, flying unicorns, and their festive DFS picks of the week.﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 14
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio cover the latest news and injuries, offer streaming quarterback and tight end options, give you their DFS picks, and use the Vegas odds to predict the game scripts.
item.itunes:summary: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio cover the latest news and injuries, offer streaming quarterback and tight end options, give you their DFS picks, and use the Vegas odds to predict the game scripts.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 13
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex Miglio and Austin Lee serve up a Thanksgiving feast of fantasy advice. They present a cornucopia of quarterback changes and dish out so many DFS picks that it will put you in a food coma.
item.itunes:summary: Alex Miglio and Austin Lee serve up a Thanksgiving feast of fantasy advice. They present a cornucopia of quarterback changes and dish out so many DFS picks that it will put you in a food coma.﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 12
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A﻿lex Miglio and Austin Lee prepare for a wintery Week 12 by shoveling out the latest news, injuries, and DFS picks. Plus, it's a Josh Gordon party!
item.itunes:summary: A﻿lex Miglio and Austin Lee prepare for a wintery Week 12 by shoveling out the latest news, injuries, and DFS picks. Plus, it's a Josh Gordon party!﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 11
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A﻿ustin Lee and Alex Miglio crank it up to 11 to give you the most intense news, rankings, and DFS tips to help your fantasy football team win.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio crank it up to 11 to give you the most intense news, rankings, and DFS tips to help your fantasy football team win.﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 10
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Daily Fantasy Sports expert, John Lee, joins Alex Miglio and Austin Lee to share his strategies for winning BIG in DFS. They also cover the latest news, injuries, and pickups.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Daily Fantasy Sports expert, John Lee, joins Alex Miglio and Austin Lee to share his strategies for winning BIG in DFS. They also cover the latest news, injuries, and pickups.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 9
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Adam Harstad of Footballguys.com joins Austin Lee and Alex Miglio to discuss bye week strategies, the latest news, our DFS picks of the week, and Adam's awesome fedora.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Adam Harstad of Footballguys.com joins Austin Lee and Alex Miglio to discuss bye week strategies, the latest news, our DFS picks of the week, and Adam's awesome fedora.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 8
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio serve up the latest in fantasy football news, injuries, and advice. They discuss matchups to exploit, DFS advice, and obscure 80s sitcom references.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio serve up the latest in fantasy football news, injuries, and advice. They discuss matchups to exploit, DFS advice, and obscure 80s sitcom references.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 7
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A﻿ustin Lee and Alex Miglio cover a plethora of injuries, tell you who to buy and sell, compare their Week 7 rankings, and offer up their DFS Stacks of the Week.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio cover a plethora of injuries, tell you who to buy and sell, compare their Week 7 rankings, and offer up their DFS Stacks of the Week.﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 6
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex Miglio and Austin Lee hit you with the fantasy spin on all the latest NFL injuries. Plus, they reveal their DFS strategies and give you their picks for the return of the Millionaire Maker.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Alex Miglio and Austin Lee hit you with the fantasy spin on all the latest NFL injuries. Plus, they reveal their DFS strategies and give you their picks for the return of the Millionaire Maker.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 5
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ﻿Fantasy legend, Bob Harris, joins Alex Miglio and Austin Lee to discuss news, injuries, Week 5 rankings, DFS strategy, and their top picks for the Millionaire Maker contest at DraftKings.
item.itunes:summary: Fantasy legend, Bob Harris, joins Alex Miglio and Austin Lee to discuss news, injuries, Week 5 rankings, DFS strategy, and their top picks for the Millionaire Maker contest at DraftKings.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 4
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: ﻿Austin Lee and Alessandro Miglio discuss bye week insanity, depleted backfields, rookie quarterbacks, trade strategy, DFS picks, and random pop culture references.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Austin Lee and Alessandro Miglio discuss bye week insanity, depleted backfields, rookie quarterbacks, trade strategy, DFS picks, and random pop culture references.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 3
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Injury-pocalypse! Austin Lee and Alex Miglio sort through the fantasy impact of a crazy week in the NFL. Polarizing player rankings, DFS picks, and more terrible puns.﻿
item.itunes:summary: Injury-pocalypse! Austin Lee and Alex Miglio sort through the fantasy impact of a crazy week in the NFL. Polarizing player rankings, DFS picks, and more terrible puns.

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 2
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Austin Lee and Alex Miglio hit you with winning fantasy football advice for Week 2. News, injuries, rankings, sleepers, DFS picks, and a dash of silliness.﻿

item.title: The Nine Route - Week 1
item.itunes:author: TheNineRoute.com
item.itunes:subtitle: On the inaugural episode of The Nine Route, Austin Lee and Alex Miglio discuss Week 1 strategy, their rankings, streaming defenses, their top day-gaming picks, and how Darrelle Revis moves his island.
item.itunes:summary: On the inaugural episode of The Nine Route, Austin Lee and Alex Miglio discuss Week 1 strategy, their rankings, streaming defenses, their top day-gaming picks, and how Darrelle Revis moves his island.
